alert.note: Alert for Lower Hells Canyon, Salmon River Region; Orofino, Grangeville Region (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Missoula (Western Montana and Central Idaho)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 23 at 11:53AM MST until December 23 at 8:00PM MST by NWS Missoula
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 PM PST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Snow expected. Rapid temperature drop behind cold front with a brief period of heavy snow. Lingering snow showers through tonight. Total snow accumulations of 1 to 3 inches. Winds could gust as high as 45 mph. * WHERE...Camas Prairie, Grangeville and vicinity, Greer Grade, Highway 95 Slate Creek to Riggins, and White Bird Grade. * WHEN...Until 7 PM PST this evening. * IMPACTS...Travel could be affected. Visibility could decrease to one-quarter mile under brief, heavy snow squalls.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Lower Hells Canyon, Salmon River Region; Orofino, Grangeville Region
